name: Mooch The Escape
description:
Simple to handle but hard to master arcade game.

You control Blink, funny little creature that collects lost soulfragments of his friend. But dangerous machines doesn't like this idea and tries to stop Blink. Run from killing buzzsaws and watch for every step...

If you like this game check out:

- Big desktop version of the Mooch -http://store.steampowered.com/app/398460

- Our Facebook page - https://www.facebook.com/CrankGoblin

-----

Controls:

W, up, gamepad up - go upwards

S, down, gamepad down - go downwards

A, left, gamepad left - go left

D, right, gamepad right - go right

or

Mouse - hold LMB to walk
